name: Midnight at the Necropolis
description:
Created in 72 hours for Survive the Game Jam 5. Design, programming, modelling and music by Snebjørn Andersen.

Instructions:

Unzip Midnight at the Necropolis.zip and run Midnight at the Necropolis.exe

Move onto graves (look for headstones) to raise the dead. They will hunt you and claim your soul if they touch you, but you can go back to their graves to pick up the precious death flowers.

Controls:

WASD + mouse for movement and direction, left shift to sprint, space to jump.

Software used:

Unity

Blender

MakeHuman

Gimp

Inkscape

Reaper
